sentence:
…to  leave his post as Australian Ambassador to the United States.

I first got to know Kevin and his wife Therese over a decade ago. But  now, more recently, as chairman and now vice chairman of the Senate  Select Committee on Intelligence, I have had the pleasure of working  with Ambassador Rudd on some of the most pressing challenges of our  time.…

…Chairman of the Committee, or if the Chairman is       not present the Vice Chairman, shall preside over all       meetings of the Committee. In the absence of the Chairman and       the Vice Chairman at any meeting, the ranking majority       member, or if no majority member is present, the ranking       minority member present, shall preside.

2.4. Consistent…
